reviewText: A well made film telling the terrible story of the Krakatoa volcano eruption and the devastation it made.  I found the characters believable and the story was factual and horrifying for those who lived it.
I know the history of Krakatoa.

The video only plays 3/4 of the way through and then freezes up. And if you try to fast forward past the part the freezes up it won't work. The whole last 1/4 freezes up. I do NOT recommend this product
